headline: How Atmos Energy’s Pipeline Expansion Impacts Its Stock Valuation After a 27% Rally
summary: If you’re eyeing Atmos Energy stock and wondering whether now is the time to buy, hold, or move on, you’re not alone. With a track record that includes a 27.2% gain year-to-date and a five-year run of nearly 118%, Atmos has drawn attention from both seasoned investors and newcomers looking for steady growth. But those impressive numbers also raise a crucial question: how does Atmos stack up when it comes to value, especially now, after such a strong run? Let’s look at what’s been happening...
